post:
Dear Users,

It is a pleasure for us to introduce our TakerBox Cloud plataform.

Due to the demand from our customers we decided to create this new project where you can buy VPS servers at an affordable price.

Feel free to choose the right plan and if you need more scale to a higher plan at any time and pay only what you use.

This time we offer 30% discount on all our plans.

Discount code: VPS30

Web: www.takerbox.com

Any doubt your needed will be happy to answer them.

Thanks,
Regards
